Title: Revenge Against Renegades
Description:
Rebel clans have laid claims to some of our camps across the river.

Such rebellious rabble need dealing with.

I trust that you are capable of teaching these rebels a lesson on my behalf?

The camps are an untidy mess as well, so just ignore the chaos for now. We can resolve that later once order is restored.
ObjectivesText: Find and defeat Rebel Centaur Warriors in the makeshift camps across the river.
